article_metadata.description: If this economic recovery feels part-time and temporary, it could be because so many of the jobs it is creating are part-time and temporary.? Part-time employment has surged in recent months, highlighting both the tentative nature of this long, slow economic recovery and the changing dynamics of work.

og.title: Part-time work often involuntary
